data.title: Wayland → East Hampton: 4 ways to travel via train, bus, ferry, and car
data.meta_description: The cheapest way to get from Wayland to East Hampton costs only €58, and the quickest way takes just 5¼ hours. Find the travel option that best suits you.
data.text:

Questions & Answers

The cheapest way to get from Wayland to East Hampton is to drive which costs €45 - €70 and takes 5h 17m.

More details

The fastest way to get from Wayland to East Hampton is to drive which takes 5h 17m and costs €45 - €70.

More details

The distance between Wayland and East Hampton is 504 km. The road distance is 460 km.

Get driving directions

The best way to get from Wayland to East Hampton without a car is to bus which takes 8h 8m and costs €80 - €140.

More details

It takes approximately 8h 8m to get from Wayland to East Hampton, including transfers.

More details

The best way to get from Wayland to East Hampton is to bus which takes 8h 8m and costs €80 - €140. Alternatively, you can train, which costs €65 - €550 and takes 8h 22m.

Mode details

Yes, the driving distance between Wayland to East Hampton is 460 km. It takes approximately 5h 17m to drive from Wayland to East Hampton.

Get driving directions

There are 225+ hotels available in East Hampton. Prices start at €80 per night.

More details

What companies run services between Wayland, MA, USA and East Hampton, NY, USA?

You can take a vehicle from Wayland to East Hampton - EB via Newton, MA, Manhattan, NY, 34 St-Hudson Yards, Grand Central-42 St, and 40th & Lex in around 8h 8m. Alternatively, you can take a vehicle from Wayland to East Hampton via Riverside, Copley, Boston, and New York Penn Station in around 8h 22m.
